Description:
Location Location Location
Adjacent to Epping Central Shops and handy to Epping Train Station and schools this unit is a must to inspect. Offering two bedrooms, the spacious main bedroom has a walk in robe and a full ensuite with double vanity, shower recess, toilet, and bidet. The second bedroom has a double built in robe. The main bathroom features a separate shower recess, bath and vanity. There is a second toilet and full sized laundry that leads to the rear yard. The kitchen features gas hotplates, under bench oven, pull out rangehood, and dishwasher. The kitchen meals living area overlooks the private courtyard which has access to both a single lock up garage and lock-up storage room. Features include Evaporative Cooling, Ducted Heating, Security Roller Shutters, Alarm System
Currently leased for $1408 per month on a month to month tenancy.
Owners Corporation / common area insurance $150 per annum
Building Insurance $592.50 per annum
Building size 105 m2 approx
Land Size 173 m2 approx
Internal area
105mÂ²

Description:
Modern Townhouse with No Owners Corporation Fees
This immaculately presented and contemporary townhouse is the perfect opportunity for any first home buyers, investors or young families.
Offering 3 generous sized bedrooms with BIR (master with WIR), formal lounge, spacious bathroom with separate shower and bath, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, pantry, dishwasher and adjoining meals area.
Also features double remote lock up carport, split system, roller shutters, block out and Holland blinds and low maintenance front and rear gardens.
Close to all amenities such as Epping Plaza, Northern Hospital, local schools and public transport.

Description:
Affordable luxury!
Spectacularly spread over two levels in the well-established Legend Hill Estate, this stunning 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom family home is luxuriously led by quality.
Freshly carpeted, discover super-spacious, open-plan living/dining, separated by a high-end, stone-topped Smeg kitchen with an imposing breakfast bar for entertaining.
Head upstairs to a tempting trio of bedrooms serviced by a pair of luxurious bathrooms, the family sized main with a bathtub and separate walk-in shower.
3 large bedrooms with mirrored BIR, main showcases a stunning twin-vanity ensuite
Handy ground-floor powder room
Separate laundry
Storage under stairs
Landscaped, low-maintenance garden and lawn
Roller blinds and recessed down-lighting
Ducted heating plus split-system heating and cooling
Remote-controlled double garage featuring internal and external access
Take advantage of local schools, shopping, transport and lush parkland all nearby. When the day is done, come home to luxury!
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Walk to Everything
Perfectly situated for convenience, this beautiful home offers 3 bedrooms, master with full ensuite & walk in robe, the other two bedrooms with mirrored built in robes serviced by a sparkling central bathroom with a spa. Modern kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, stone bench top and a dishwasher with large open plan family/meals area.
Superbly presented both inside and out, further features includes the comforts of ducted heating, evap cooling, remote control garage with internal & external access, low maintenance, fully landscaped gardens and currently leased for $1738 per calendar month.
Located within walking distance to Aurora Village Shopping Centre, Harvest Home Primary School, public transport, parks & easy access to the Hume Freeway. Move in or invest, this property represents an ultimate buying opportunity!

Description:
Brilliant Start, Fantastic Investment, Desirable Downsize
A lifestyle oasis peacefully tucked away in the sought-after Epping, this striking home enjoys a fabulous outlook to the peaceful environs close to parklands and reserve.
Designed and appointed with easy living in mind, the lower level introduces a sun-soaked, formal lounge complementing a generous open plan living zone. Opening to a private yard which links the house to the double garage (accessed via a rear laneway), it integrates a stone kitchen fitted with 900 mm stainless steel appliances soft close cabinetry, and butler pantry/laundry. A guest powder room and storage space highlights a clever floorplan. The decked backyard is entertainers paradise featuring remote operated foldable awnings, dual gazeboes and a dedicated barbeque area to enjoy every season of the year.
The upper level boasts three bedrooms, the main features walk in robe, large ensuite and a full ensuite, other 2 bedrooms features BIR well serviced by spacious central bathroom.
Featuring, ducted heating, split system cooling and heating throughout,( in all bedrooms and living areas ) and a mix of floorboards and carpets, solar boosted hot water system, double garage etc. only minutes away to harvest Home recreation and reserve, Epping North Shopping precinct, Epping Views school, buses and a short drive to Epping Plaza, Epping train station, Aurora shopping village, childcare, health and recreational facilities. Inspect today.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
Convenience, Location and Value
Nestled comfortably in a quiet friendly street in the popular Hayston Estate, in close distance to Lyndarum shops, Pacific Epping, supermarkets, local schools, daycare centres, medical amenities and eateries, the convenience of this location could not be better.
A spacious, light filled three bedroom double storey home offers plenty of space for the whole family. With a generous master bedroom with mirrored built in robes, en-suite bathroom with double vanity and stone bench, a further two bedrooms both with mirrored built in robes, serviced by an additional spacious central bathroom with stone bench and separate bath.
Downstairs boasts an open plan living room with formal dining area, followed on by a well appointed gas kitchen with 20mm stonetop benches, dishwasher and adjoining family meals area, opening up onto a private rear courtyard area to enjoy. A pleasant place to call home and a great performing investment, currently returning $1695 per calendar month.
Additional features:
Evaporative cooling
Ducted heating throughout
Double remote secure garage
Additional powder room downstairs
Currently leased until July 2020

Description:
Lifestyle, Luxury and Location
A blissful existence for the family who loves to spread out in style and entertain to impress. This home shows off high ceilings, large living zones and open spaces that complement the high standard of finish that you deserve. Comprises 3 great sized bedrooms all with BIR's (master with Ensuite), light filled formal lounge area, designer kitchen with stone benchtops that oversees the casual meals area & family living area, central bathroom, formal dining area, 2 car garage & a covered paved outdoor area with fixed BBQ & sink & 6mtr swim spa for your entertaining needs. Extra features include 900ml stainless steel appliances, ducted heating, dishwasher, evaporative cooling, 20 x 5.5kw Solar panels, intercom, alarm, heaps of storage space & landscaped gardens. All this set in one of the most sought after pockets of Epping which is within close proximity to parks, schools, shops & transport.

Description:
Spacious 5 Bedroom Family Home
Situated in a quiet court location and on a huge parcel of land measuring 663sqm (approx), this stunning home has easy access to all amenities such as Darebin Creek bike track, Westfield Shopping Centre, Epping Plaza, Costco, Northern Hospital, public transport and more.
Comprising of 5 good sized bedrooms (master with WIR and full ensuite), large kitchen with dining area, bathroom with separate shower and spa bath and a large family living area with access to the outdoor undercover entertainment area.
Added features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, remote control garage and an established and landscaped garden with a large shed.
Perfect for any first home buyer, young family or investor.

Description:
Epping Central's Freshest 2 Bed Unit
Calling all First Home Buyers, Investors and Local Downsizers. This ready-to-live-in 2 bedroom unit is the freshest on the market. Painted throughout, plush new carpets and a new granite bench top and oven are some of the highlights of this incredible opportunity. With nothing more to do than move in, this is an ideal option for those too busy to renovate and would prefer to immediately earn an income or relax in their new home. Boasting a spacious light filled floor plan and low maintenance courtyard with undercover pergola, the property is quietly set at the rear of the complex, yet close to all of Epping's wonderful amenities, namely Epping Train Station, Schools, Pacific Epping Mall and the Northern Hospital all within 1.5km from the property.
It also features a split system climate unit and secure single car garage for the ultimate package.
This won't last, inspect today!

Corner Location- Prime position - 601m2!
A golden opportunity to invest in our ever-growing central Epping, with possibilities of subdivision STCA.
Only minutes walk to Epping train station, schools and only minutes drive to Epping Plaza, Northern hospital further confirms its ideal location.
Offering a 3 bedroom, Brick veneer home with L shaped lounge and dining room, a functional kitchen with an adjoining meals set amongst timber floors.
Currently let with tenants wishing to stay on.
Excellent investment, Ideal 1sr Home!

Description:
Move Right In Or Lease Right Out!
Look no further with this stunning home in the heart of Lyndarum Estate.
Features include large open plan living, 3 great size bedrooms with BIR, master with ensuite and walk in robe and central bathroom to cater for all. Continue through with adjoining kitchen/meals, that is fully equipped with high end stainless steel appliances, overlooking the spacious lounge area. Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and security alarm system. Entertain the family all year round with a stunning outdoor entertainment area all within 2 minutes' walk from St Mary Of The Cross Mackillop Primary School. Set on a block size of 374m2 (approx).

Description:
Central Location - Walking Distance To Westfield
First home buyers investors take note. This lovely home is situated in a court location close to all amenities. Comprising entry, lounge, dining, kitchen plus meals area, 3 bedrooms all with built in robes. Explore outside to find a beautiful undercover alfresco area entertaining family and friends all year round. Features ceiling fans, heating, window shutters and garden shed. All within close proximity to Westfield Shopping Centre, South Morang Train Station, Greenbrook Shops, Epping Primary School and Meadow Glen Primary School. Ideal entry level into the property market.

Description:
SOLD for $519,000 by Nick Petrovski
Comprising:
- 3 great sized bedrooms.
- Large Master with ensuite and walk in robe plus balcony
- Open plan Kitchen/Meals/Living.
- Separate Upstairs Retreat/Lounge
- Study Nook
- Private Courtyard
- Double Remote Garage with internal access
- Overlooking reserve and with great walking tracks
Conveniently located close to shops such as, Woolworths, Coles and many local small businesses. Being centrally located in multiple school districts you have the option of Epping Views Primary School, St Mary Of The Cross McKillop, Harvest Home Primary School, Epping Secondary College, Edgars Creek Secondary College plus more!
Contact Nick Petrovski 0412 838 020

Description:
The Perfect Start!
$460,000 - $506,000
This neat and tidy 3 bedroom home set on a generous allotment of 526m2 (approx) is located in a sought after pocket of Epping within a short distance to Westfield Shopping Centre, South Morang Train Station, bus services, schools, parklands and sporting grounds. The home offers 3 bedrooms, 2 with BIR's, lounge, dining, kitchen, central bathroom and laundry, gas wall heater & refrigerated air conditioner, alfresco area, carport with remote door, shed and a large backyard offering endless possibilities, add your personal touch, extend the home or develop (STCA). The perfect investment opportunity for first home buyers and investors alike to add value in this prized location, renovate or develop to reap the rewards. Must be sold.
Auction - Saturday 14th December 11:00PM
Jim Vlahos
0434 382 485
